trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of installers to be run during an installation.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de instaladores para ser executado durante a instalação.

trans-unit.source: The InstallerCollection provides the methods and properties that your application needs to manage a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> objects.
trans-unit.target: O InstallerCollection fornece os métodos e propriedades que seu aplicativo precisa para gerenciar uma coleção de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>objetos.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following three ways to add installers to the collection: - The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A> method adds a single installer to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use qualquer um dos três formas para adicionar instaladores na coleção: - o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A>método adiciona um único instalador à coleção.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A> methods add multiple installers to the collection.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>métodos adicionam vários instaladores na coleção.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A> method and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A> property, which is the InstallerCollection indexer, each add a single installer to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A>método e o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A>propriedade, que é o indexador InstallerCollection, cada adicionar um instalador único na coleção no índice especificado.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: Remove installers through the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Remover instaladores por meio de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check whether an installer is in the collection by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se o instalador está na coleção usando o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>método.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: Find where an installer is located in the collection by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Localizar onde um instalador está localizado na coleção usando o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A>método.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The installers in a collection are run when the installer containing the collection, as specified by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, calls their <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Os instaladores em uma coleção são executados quando o instalador que contém a coleção, conforme especificado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, chama seus <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, ou <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For examples of the usage of an installer collection, see the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> classes.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos do uso de uma coleção de instalador, consulte o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>classes.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified installer to this collection of installers.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o instalador especificado para esta coleção de instaladores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to specify the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>propriedade adicionado <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>é definido para especificar o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>que contém essa coleção.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> que representa o instalador para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the added installer.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do instalador adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified array of installers to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a matriz de instaladores especificada para essa coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of each added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>propriedade de cada adicionado <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>é definido como o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>que contém essa coleção.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installers to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> que representa os instaladores para adicionar a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection of installers to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a coleção de instaladores especificada para essa coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of each added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>propriedade de cada adicionado <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>é definido como o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>que contém essa coleção.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection"></xref> that represents the installers to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection"> </xref> que representa os instaladores para adicionar a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified installer is included in collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o instalador especificado está incluído na coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to look for.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> que representa o instalador para procurar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified installer is in this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o instalador especificado na coleção; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the collection to an array, begining at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os itens da coleção para uma matriz, começando no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy to.
trans-unit.target: A matriz na qual copiar.

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to paste the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice da matriz na qual colar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specified installer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina o índice de um instalador especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> localizar na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the installer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do instalador na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified installer into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere o instalador especificado na coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the installer.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual inserir o instalador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> para inserir.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an installer at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um instalador no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: When the specified <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> that contains the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando especificado <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>é colocado no <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>é definido como o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>que contém a coleção.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the installer to get or set.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do instalador para obter ou definir.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> que representa o instalador no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before a new installer is inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Executa processos personalizados adicionais antes de um novo instalador é inserido na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `value`.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual inserir `value`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the installer at `index`.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do instalador no `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before an installer is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Executa processos personalizados adicionais antes de um instalador é removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` can be found.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual `value` pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The installer to be removed from `index`.
trans-unit.target: O instalador a ser removido da `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before an existing installer is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Executa processos personalizados adicionais antes de um instalador existente é definido como um novo valor.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to replace `oldValue`.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual substituir `oldValue`.

trans-unit.source: The value to replace with `newValue.`
trans-unit.target: O valor para substituir`newValue.`

trans-unit.source: The new value of the installer at `index`.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do instalador no `index`.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the removed <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>propriedade o removido <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>é definido como `null`.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to remove.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> que representa o instalador para remover.
